statements: SELECT * FROM electricity_generation_data
SELECT source, energy_generated FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE generation_capacity > 1000
SELECT id, source, timestamp FROM electricity_generation_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE energy_generated BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT source, generation_capacity FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE source = 'Wind'
SELECT * FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE source = 'Solar' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source, energy_generated FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE energy_generated > 100 ORDER BY energy_generated DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, source, timestamp, generation_capacity, energy_generated FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE generation_capacity BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY generation_capacity DESC;
SELECT source, SUM(energy_generated) AS total_energy_generated FROM electricity_generation_data GROUP BY source HAVING total_energy_generated > 5000;
SELECT id, source, timestamp, energy_generated FROM electricity_generation_data WHERE source = 'Wind' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity > 100
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_id = 1
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels ORDER BY panel_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_capacity < 200
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT panel_capacity, panel_location FROM solar_panels ORDER BY panel_capacity DESC
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_location = 'New York' AND panel_capacity < 200
SELECT turbine_location, turbine_capacity FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, power_output FROM solar_panel_data WHERE power_output > 100;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM wind_turbine_data WHERE wind_speed >= 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, location, power_output FROM wind_turbine_data WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT generation_date, total_power_output FROM electricity_generation_summary WHERE generation_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT location, power_output FROM solar_panel_data WHERE power_output > 100 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, location, power_output FROM wind_turbine_data WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY power_output DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM solar_panel_data WHERE location LIKE 'California%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT location, generation_date, total_power_output FROM electricity_generation_summary WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY generation_date DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT id, power_output, timestamp FROM solar_panel_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY power_output DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT location, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency >= 0.15 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, blade_length FROM WindTurbines WHERE blade_length < 50 ORDER BY blade_length;
SELECT * FROM ElectricityGeneration WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, location, capacity, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT id, blade_length, hub_height, location FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY blade_length DESC
SELECT id, datetime, source, production FROM ElectricityGeneration WHERE source = 'solar' AND production > 500 ORDER BY datetime
SELECT id, datetime, location, amount FROM ElectricityConsumption WHERE amount < 200 ORDER BY location, datetime DESC
SELECT id, location, capacity, efficiency FROM SolarPanels UNION SELECT id, location, blade_length, hub_height FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT location, power_output FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE power_output > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT statistic_id, metric, value, unit FROM EnergyStatistics WHERE metric LIKE '%efficiency%'
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY generation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, power_output FROM WindTurbines WHERE power_output > 1000 ORDER BY power_output DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location, generation_date FROM SolarPanels WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY generation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ElectricityConsumers WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND consumed_power < 500 ORDER BY consumed_power;
SELECT transaction_id, from_source, to_destination, amount FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
